REVERSED INFRARED PROTOCOL PWM

CHANNEL BUTTON 1: 		11111111 00100000 00000111 11111000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 2: 		11111111 00100000 00111111 11000000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 3: 		11111111 00100000 11011111 00100000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 4: 		11111111 00100000 01011111 10100000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 5: 		11111111 00100000 11000111 00111000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 6: 		11111111 00100000 10011111 01100000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 7: 		11111111 00100000 00011111 11100000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 8: 		11111111 00100000 11101111 00010000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 9: 		11111111 00100000 01000111 10111000 0
CHANNEL BUTTON 0: 		11111111 00100000 10101111 01010000 0
ON/OFF: 			11111111 00100000 11110111 00001000 0
MUTE: 				11111111 00100000 01001111 10110000 0
OK BUTTON: 			11111111 00100000 11100111 00011000 0
VOLUME UP: 			11111111 00100000 00110111 11001000 0
VOLUME DOWN: 			11111111 00100000 10001111 01110000 0
CHANNEL UP: 			11111111 00100000 01100111 10011000 0
CHANNEL DOWN: 			11111111 00100000 01110111 10001000 0
SOURCE BUTTON: 			11111111 00100000 10100111 01011000 0
LCD-MENU BUTTON: 		11111111 00100000 11010111 00101000 0
UP: 				11111111 00100000 10010111 01101000 0
DOWN: 				11111111 00100000 10110111 01001000 0
LEFT: 				11111111 00100000 00010111 11101000 0
RIGHT: 				11111111 00100000 11001111 00110000 0
EXIT: 				11111111 00100000 11111101 00000010 0
